cause.description:
This country has hit a significant low under the direction of Bush and Cheney and something needs to be done. Joe Biden, Hilary Clinton, John Edwards, and Barack Obama are the candidates that i feel will the do the best job.
1. Get A Democrat in Office
2. Get 1 of the 4 mentioned in office
cause.mission: get one of these guys in office and try to save fix this country
cause.name: Biden, Clinton, Edwards, Obama For President
